sources.title: BUTCHER BOY (1917) -- Roscoe Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John
sources.description: BUTCHER BOY (1917) Starring: Roscoe Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John, Josephine Evans, Arthur Earle, Agnes Neilson, Joe Bordeaux Story by Joe Roach Directed by Arbuckle Produced by Joseph M. Schenck Comique Film Corporation Wm. Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

sources.title: The Butcher Boy
sources.description: The Butcher Boy Fatty Arbuckle and Buster Keaton (1ยบ movie!!!) IMDB: This Fatty Arbuckle short feature is a historical treasure in that it was the first film appearance of the great Buster Keaton, and it has some decent slapstick too. Runtime: 30 min Country: USA Language: English Color: Black and White (tinted) Sound Mix: Silent

metadata.Plot: Customers and clerks frolic in a general store. Roscoe walks out of the freezer wearing a fur coat, then does some clever cleaver tossing. In Buster's film debut he buys a pail of molasses.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Buster Keaton, Al St. John
